snippet.title: [Trailer-OP] Crystal Captor: Memory Chronicle Finale
snippet.description:
Introducing our third completed game, "Crystal Captor: Memory Chronicle Finale", an RPG created for the So Bad, It's Good! Jam 2017 at itch.io! We ranked at #1 out of 28 entries!

You can download it free from our itch.io page;
https://tofu-sheets-visual.itch.io/crystal-captor-memory-chronicle-finale
As well as our GameeJolt page;
http://gamejolt.com/games/crystalcaptormcf/270096
* Note it will sadly not be available at RPGMaker.net due to being rejected for bad mapping... I guess they didn't get the humour *

You can also purchase the "Best of The Worst" Bundle featuring the Top 10 entries (including ours) for a dollar or above for charity;
https://nedreid.itch.io/best-of-the-worst

CREDITS:
Video - Kokoro Hane
Voices - Doodled, Kokoro Hane
Artwork - Inkhana, Division Heaven, Chocolate Mint, (Default RTP), tasogare-tei, minikle
Music - SILDRA COMPANY http://sildra.main.jp/index.php
